name: Oh! Jerry: Lost His Keys
description:
Jerry has lost his keys! Well, it can't be too dramatic..... or can it?

Play as Jerry and defeat evil bosses. Explore new areas on the map(and also some secrets perhaps.....)

Are you ready for this exciting adventure? WARNING: GAME CONTAINS FLASHING IMAGES. PLEASE PLAY WITH CAUTION.

FEATURES:

  • Immersive and original music.
  • Immersive and original voices .
  • Enjoyable experience.
  • 5 HIDDEN SECRETS (EASTER EGGS!).
  • Short and not much time consuming.

The game has a story which will be revealed a bit in each parts. Oh! Jerry will have three parts! 

The other two parts are yet to be in development. I Hope you'll stick around through all the 3 parts! :D
